verses.verse: Then <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
<S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H4448>speak<s%> these <S%H561>things?<s%> Shall the words of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be a <S%H3524>mighty<s%> <S%H7307>wind?<s%>
Does <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>justice?<s%> Or does the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness?<s%>
If your <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7971>him,<s%> He has delivered them into the hand <S%H3027>of<s%> their <S%H6588>disobedience.<s%>
If you want to <S%H7836>seek<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7836>diligently,<s%> make your <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>

If you were <S%H2134>pure<s%> and <S%H3477>upright,<s%> surely now he would <S%H5782>awaken<s%> for <S%H5116>you,<s%> and make the habitation of your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H7999>prosperous.<s%>
Though your <S%H7225>beginning<s%> was <S%H4705>small,<s%> yet your latter <S%H319>end<s%> would <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7685>increase.<s%>
"Please <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of <S%H7223>past<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H3559>Find<s%> out about the <S%H2714>learning<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
(For we are but of <S%H8543>yesterday,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3117>nothing,<s%> because our days on <S%H776>earth<s%> are a <S%H6738>shadow.<s%>)
Shall they not <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> tell <S%H3318>you,<s%> and utter <S%H4405>words<s%> out of their <S%H3820>heart?<s%>
"Can the <S%H1573>papyrus<s%> grow <S%H1342>up<s%> without <S%H1207>mire?<s%> <S%H7685>Can<s%> the <S%H260>rushes<s%> <S%H7685>grow<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4325>water?<s%>
While it is yet in its <S%H3>greenness,<s%> not cut <S%H6998>down,<s%> it <S%H3001>withers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any other <S%H2682>reed.<s%>
So are the <S%H734>paths<s%> of all who <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%> The <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H2611>godless<s%> man shall <S%H6>perish,<s%>
Whose <S%H3689>confidence<s%> shall break <S%H6990>apart,<s%> Whose <S%H4009>trust<s%> is a <S%H5908>spider<s%>'s <S%H1004>web.<s%>
He shall <S%H8172>lean<s%> on his <S%H1004>house,<s%> but it shall not <S%H5975>stand.<s%> He shall <S%H2388>cling<s%> to <S%H6965>it,<s%> but it shall not endure.
He is <S%H7373>green<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> His <S%H3127>shoots<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> over his <S%H1593>garden.<s%>
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> are wrapped <S%H5440>around<s%> the rock <S%H1530>pile.<s%> He <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H1004>place<s%> of <S%H68>stones.<s%>
If he is <S%H1104>destroyed<s%> from his <S%H4725>place,<s%> then it shall <S%H3584>deny<s%> <S%H7200>him,<s%> saying, 'I have not seen you.'
<S%H4885>Behold,<s%> this is the joy of his <S%H1870>way:<s%> out of the <S%H6083>earth,<s%> <S%H312>others<s%> shall <S%H6779>spring.<s%>
<S%H410>"Behold,<s%> God will not cast <S%H3988>away<s%> a <S%H8535>blameless<s%> <S%H2388>man,<s%> neither will he uphold the <S%H7489>evildoers.<s%>
He will still <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> your <S%H8193>lips<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting.<s%>
Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame.<s%> The <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be no <S%H369>more.<s%>"
